conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a monster (character species) movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM

I think I have just the right monster movie for you! Have you considered "Van Helsing"? It's an action-packed adventure that brings together some of the most iconic monsters in literature, including Dracula and Frankenstein's creature. Plus, Hugh Jackman stars as the titular hero - he's always a great watch!

Or, if you're in the mood for something a bit more fast-paced and intense, "Cloverfield" might be just what you need. It's a found-footage horror movie that follows a group of friends as they try to survive a monster attack on the streets of New York City - it's really thrilling and will keep you on the edge of your seat!
